raw.title: [BIP-609] Enable Gauge for wrsETH/WETH [Optimism]
raw.author: 0x7c2eA10D3e5922ba3bBBafa39Dc0677353D2AF17
raw.body:
PR with Payload
https://github.com/BalancerMaxis/multisig-ops/pull/970

Summary:

Kelp proposes to add a veBAL gauge for the [wrsETH/WETH] on Balancer]

Child Gauge: https://optimistic.etherscan.io/address/0xA15C762974BA3aC59abc305FbA097A0E564F7470

Root Gauge: https://etherscan.io/address/0x65a5C255cfDDb99CAcCaCeE6f0FA63F3AB886e79

References/Useful links:

• Website: https://kelpdao.xyz/restake/

• Documentation: https://kelp.gitbook.io/kelp

• Github Public Repo: https://github.com/Kelp-DAO/KelpDAO-contracts

• Twitter: https://twitter.com/KelpDAO

Protocol Description:

rsETH is one of the largest LST-based liquid restaked token on the EigenLayer ecosystem. It represents the liquidity of the underlying assets that have been deposited on Kelp. rsETH provides liquidity for the restaked positions, accumulates the rewards, and simplifies rewards management for AVSs

Kelp has more than 260,000 ETH worth of assets restaked by over 40,000 users across multiple L2s. All of this is within 4 months of launch

By providing liquidity for the restaked positions, wrsETH allows for a seamless experience to engage with DeFi activities and maximize rewards.

Motivation:

Kelp is seeking to establish the [wrsETH/ETH on Optimism] and on Balancer to further enrich the liquidity of wrsETH. This move aims to enhance the trading experience of users, making it more accessible for users while generating additional value for the Kelp community.

Specifications:

1. Governance: Kelp currently operates with a multi-sig wallet. The protocol is planning to transition to decentralized governance soon

2. Oracles: Kelp is working with Redstone to create price feeds of rsETH.

3. Audits: Kelp’s smart contracts are audited by Sigma Prime and Code4rena.

  1. Sigma Prime Report: https://kelpdao.xyz/audits/smartcontracts/SigmaPrime.pdf
  2. Code4rena: [Code4rena | Keeping high severity bugs out of production](https://code4rena.com/reports/2023-11-kelp)
  3. MixBytes: [KELPDAO LRT-ETH SECURITY AUDIT REPORT](https://kelpdao.xyz/audits/smartcontracts/mixbytes.pdf)

4. Centralization vectors: Centralization vectors currently are around upgradeability via proxy multi-sig and front-end hosting.

Our goal is to migrate Kelp away from these vectors.

5. Market History: Kelp has seen meteoric growth in TVL in the last few weeks with TVL over 260k ETH and >40,000 holders of rsETH across mainnet and L2s.

The balancer pools are already live and are available on Optimism

Optimism pool: https://app.balancer.fi/#/optimism/pool/0x73a7fe27fe9545d53924e529acf11f3073841b9e000000000000000000000133

6. Value: The balancer pool is the 2nd liquidity pool on Optimism and is aimed at providing liquidity to the growing community.

Technical Specifications:

Transaction: The Balancer Maxi LM Multisig `eth:0xc38c5f97B34E175FFd35407fc91a937300E33860` will interact with the GaugeAdderv4 at 0x5DbAd78818D4c8958EfF2d5b95b28385A22113Cd and call the `addGauge` function with the following arguments:

gauge(address): `0x65a5C255cfDDb99CAcCaCeE6f0FA63F3AB886e79`

gaugeType(string): `Optimism`

choices: No, this is not the way

raw.title: [BIP-624] Enable rsETH / WETH Gauge (Arbitrum)
raw.author: 0x7019Be4E4eB74cA5F61224FeAf687d2b43998516
raw.body:
### PR with Payload
https://github.com/BalancerMaxis/multisig-ops/pull/1032

**Summary:**

Kelp proposes to add a veBAL gauge for the rsETH/WETH pool on Arbitrum
https://app.balancer.fi/#/arbitrum/pool/0x90e6cb5249f5e1572afbf8a96d8a1ca6acffd73900000000000000000000055c

**Child Gauge:** https://arbiscan.io/address/0x59907f88C360D576Aa38dba84F26578367F96b6C#code

**Root Gauge:** https://etherscan.io/address/0x061130d4715FCD4828BfCAf6B1a9B93DF5e6e4c9

**References/Useful links:**

• Website: https://kelpdao.xyz/restake/

• Documentation: [Introduction | Kelp](https://kelp.gitbook.io/kelp)

• Github Public Repo: https://github.com/Kelp-DAO/KelpDAO-contracts

• Twitter: https://twitter.com/KelpDAO

**Protocol Description:**

rsETH is one of the largest LST-based liquid restaked token on the EigenLayer ecosystem. It represents the liquidity of the underlying assets that have been deposited on Kelp. rsETH provides liquidity for the restaked positions, accumulates the rewards, and simplifies rewards management for AVSs

Kelp has more than 260,000 ETH worth of assets restaked by over 40,000 users across multiple L2s. All of this is within 4 months of launch

By providing liquidity for the restaked positions, wrsETH allows for a seamless experience to engage with DeFi activities and maximize rewards.

**Motivation:**

Kelp is seeking to establish the [rsETH/ETH on Arbitrum] and on Balancer to further enrich the liquidity of rsETH. This move aims to enhance the trading experience of users, making it more accessible for users while generating additional value for the Kelp community.

**Specifications:**

1. **Governance:** Kelp currently operates with a multi-sig wallet. The protocol is planning to transition to decentralized governance soon
2. **Oracles:** Kelp is working with Redstone to create price feeds of rsETH.
3. **Audits:** Kelp’s smart contracts are audited by Sigma Prime and Code4rena.
4. Sigma Prime Report: https://kelpdao.xyz/audits/smartcontracts/SigmaPrime.pdf
5. Code4rena: [Code4rena | Keeping high severity bugs out of production](https://code4rena.com/reports/2023-11-kelp)
6. MixBytes: [KELPDAO LRT-ETH SECURITY AUDIT REPORT](https://kelpdao.xyz/audits/smartcontracts/mixbytes.pdf)
7. **Centralization vectors:** Centralization vectors currently are around upgradeability via proxy multi-sig and front-end hosting.

Kelp's goal is to migrate Kelp away from these vectors.

- . **Market History:** Kelp has seen meteoric growth in TVL in the last few weeks with TVL over 260k ETH and >40,000 holders of rsETH across mainnet and L2s.



Arbitrum pool: [Balancer](TO BE ADDED)
Rate provider: https://arbiscan.io/address/0x3222d3de5a9a3ab884751828903044cc4adc627e#code

- . **Value:** This will be the first wrsETH balancer pool on Arbitrum and is aimed at providing primary liquidity for wrsETH on ARB.

**Technical Specifications:**

Transaction: The Balancer Maxi LM Multisig `eth:0xc38c5f97B34E175FFd35407fc91a937300E33860` will interact with the GaugeAdderv4 at `0x5DbAd78818D4c8958EfF2d5b95b28385A22113Cd` and call the `addGauge` function with the following arguments:

gauge(address): `0x061130d4715FCD4828BfCAf6B1a9B93DF5e6e4c9`

gaugeType(string): `Arbitrum`

choices: No, this is not the way

raw.title: [BIP-540] Enable Gauge for [rsETH/ETHx on Ethereum Mainnet] and [WETH/rsETH on Polygon zkEVM]
raw.author: 0x9f74662aD05840Ba35d111930501c617920dD68e
raw.body:
### PR with Payloads
https://github.com/BalancerMaxis/multisig-ops/pull/782

**Summary:**
Kelp proposes to add a veBAL gauge for the [rsETH/ETHx on Ethereum Mainnet] and [WETH/rsETH on Polygon zkEVM] on [Balancer]

**Gauge Address:** 
Mainnet: https://etherscan.io/address/0x0BcDb6d9b27Bd62d3De605393902C7d1a2c71Aab?

Polygon zkEVM: https://etherscan.io/address/0x047301b311741ce6C007FFEF7f182Ec93ab07968#readContract

**References/Useful links:**

    • Website: https://kelpdao.xyz/restake/
    • Documentation: https://kelp.gitbook.io/kelp
    • Github Public Repo: https://github.com/Kelp-DAO/KelpDAO-contracts 
    • Twitter: https://twitter.com/KelpDAO

**Protocol Description:**

rsETH is the largest LST-based liquid restaked token on the EigenLayer ecosystem. It represents the liquidity of the underlying assets that have been deposited on Kelp. rsETH provides liquidity for the restaked positions, accumulates the rewards, and simplifies rewards management for AVSs

Kelp has more than 113,000 ETH worth of assets restaked by over 14,000 users. All of this is within 7 weeks of launching on Mainnet.

By providing liquidity for the restaked positions, rsETH allows for a seamless experience to engage with DeFi activities and maximize rewards.

**Motivation:**

Kelp is seeking to establish the [rsETH/ETHx on Mainnet] and [WETH/rsETH on Polygon zkEVM] on Balancer to further enrich the liquidity of rsETH. This move aims to enhance the trading experience of users, making it more accessible for users while generating additional value for the Kelp community.

**Specifications:**
 
1. **Governance:** Kelp currently operates with a multi-sig wallet. The protocol is planning to transition to decentralized governance soon

2. **Oracles:** Kelp is working with Redstone to create price feeds of rsETH.

3. **Audits:** Kelp's smart contracts are audited by Sigma Prime and Code4rena. 
Sigma Prime Report: https://kelpdao.xyz/audits/smartcontracts/SigmaPrime.pdf
Code4rena: https://code4rena.com/reports/2023-11-kelp

4. **Centralization vectors:** Centralization vectors currently are around upgradeability via proxy multi-sig and front-end hosting.

Our goal is to migrate Kelp away from these vectors.

5. **Market History:** Kelp has seen meteoric growth in TVL in the last few weeks with TVL over 113k ETH and >14,000 holders of rsETH.
 
The balancer pools are already live and are available here: 

[Mainnet Pool](https://app.balancer.fi/#/ethereum/pool/0x7761b6e0daa04e70637d81f1da7d186c205c2ade00000000000000000000065d) 
[Polygon zkEVM Pool](https://app.balancer.fi/#/zkevm/pool/0xffc865fcb34e754fad4b0144139b9c28c81c3eff00000000000000000000005f)

Gauges: 
[Mainnet Gauge](https://etherscan.io/address/0x0BcDb6d9b27Bd62d3De605393902C7d1a2c71Aab?)
[Polygon zkEVM Gauge](https://etherscan.io/address/0x047301b311741ce6C007FFEF7f182Ec93ab07968#readContract  )

6. **Value:** The balancer pool is the first liquidity pool on Polygon zkEVM and is aimed at providing liquidity to the growing community.

**Technical Specifications:**

Transaction: The Balancer Maxi LM Multisig eth:`0xc38c5f97B34E175FFd35407fc91a937300E33860` will interact with the GaugeAdderv4 at `0x5DbAd78818D4c8958EfF2d5b95b28385A22113Cd` and call the `addGauge` function with the following arguments:
gauge(address):`0x0BcDb6d9b27Bd62d3De605393902C7d1a2c71Aab`
gaugeType(string): `Ethereum`

gauge(address):`0x047301b311741ce6C007FFEF7f182Ec93ab07968`
gaugeType(string): `Polygon zkEVM`

choices: No, this is not the way

raw.title: [BIP-553] Enable 50KEP/50rsETH Gauge w/ 2% Cap [Ethereum]
raw.author: 0x9f74662aD05840Ba35d111930501c617920dD68e
raw.body:
### PR with Payload
https://github.com/BalancerMaxis/multisig-ops/pull/821

**Summary:**

> This KEP/rsETH pool to be a 50/50 Weighted Pool.
>
>
>
> This gauge is capped at 2%, and would enter as a “core pool” under [BIP-19](https://forum.balancer.fi/t/bip-19-incentivize-core-pools-l2-usage/3329) on the basis of 1% swap fee and rsETH being an Liquid Restaking Token (LRT) that generates yield.

**References/Useful links:**

> *rsETH*
>
>
>
> * [Website](https://kelpdao.xyz/)
> * [Documentation](https://kelp.gitbook.io/kelp)
> * [Github Page](https://github.com/Kelp-DAO/KelpDAO-contracts)
> * [Twitter](https://twitter.com/KelpDAO)

> *KEP*
>
>
>
> * [Website](https://kelpdao.xyz/)
> * [Documentation](https://hackmd.io/HqMqbFrcQk2IZEv91v7r4Q)
> * [Github Page](https://hackmd.io/HqMqbFrcQk2IZEv91v7r4Q)
> * [Twitter](https://twitter.com/KelpDAO)

**Protocol Description:**

> *rsETH*
>
>
>
> rsETH is the [third](https://defillama.com/protocols/Liquid%20Restaking) largest LST-based liquid restaked token on the EigenLayer ecosystem. It represents the liquidity of the underlying assets that have been deposited on Kelp Protocol. rsETH provides liquidity for the restaked positions, accumulates the rewards, and simplifies rewards management for AVSs.
>
>
>
> Kelp has more than 185,000 ETH worth of assets restaked.
>
>
>
> By providing liquidity for the restaked positions, rsETH allows for a seamless experience to engage with DeFi activities and maximize rewards.
>
>
>
> *KEP*
>
>
>
> KEP is a token representation of Kelp's EigenLayer Points, where 1 $KEP = 1 EL Point.
>
>
>
> Launch Details can be found [here](https://twitter.com/KelpDAO/status/1760722182869799390).

**Motivation:**

> Kelp is seeking to establish the KEP/rsETH on Balancer as the primary pool for KEP. This pool is expected to experience large trading volume by creating a secondary market for Kelp's EigenLayer Points.
>
>
>
> Liquidity Providers can expect to receive KEP as well as the normal BAL and AURA rewards.

**Specifications:**

> 1. **Governance:**
>
>
>
> * Kelp currently operates with a multi-sig wallet. The protocol is planning to transition to decentralized governance soon.
>
>
>
> 2. **Oracles:**
>
>
>
> * rateProvider0 (for KEP): 0x0 (none)
> * rateProvider1 (for rsETH): `0x746df66bc1bb361b9e8e2a794c299c3427976e6c`
>
>
>
> 3. **Audits:**
>
>
>
> * Kelp’s smart contracts are audited by Sigma Prime and Code4rena.
> * Sigma Prime Report: https://kelpdao.xyz/audits/smartcontracts/SigmaPrime.pdf
> * Code4rena: [Code4rena | Keeping high severity bugs out of production](https://code4rena.com/reports/2023-11-kelp)
>
>
>
> 4. **Centralization vectors:**
> Centralization vectors currently are around upgradeability via proxy multi-sig and front-end hosting.
>
>
>
> Our goal is to migrate Kelp away from these vectors.
>
>
>
> 5. **Market History:**
>
>
>
> * KEP is to be launched 28th February 2024.
> * rsETH represents more than 185,000 of restaked ETH and its trading history can be found [here](https://www.coingecko.com/en/coins/kelp-dao-restaked-eth).
>
>
>
> 6. **Value:**
>
>
>
> * This pool is a Core Pool and therefore will generate revenue for the DAO via rsETH derived yield and from the 1% swap fee.

**Pool Details**

> Link to Pool: [0xFf42A9AF956617e4C3532eF2fC7567465EFE4909](https://app.balancer.fi/#/ethereum/pool/0xff42a9af956617e4c3532ef2fc7567465efe4909000200000000000000000672)
> Link to Gauges: [0xc6b65bc6bF4a5fF4D90fDf7f568cBF8C99419DA1](https://etherscan.io/address/0xc6b65bc6bF4a5fF4D90fDf7f568cBF8C99419DA1)

### Specification

Transaction: The Balancer Maxi LM Multisig `eth:0xc38c5f97B34E175FFd35407fc91a937300E33860` will interact with the GaugeAdderv4 at `0x5DbAd78818D4c8958EfF2d5b95b28385A22113Cd` and call the `addGauge` function with the following arguments:

gauge(address): `0xc6b65bc6bF4a5fF4D90fDf7f568cBF8C99419DA1`

gaugeType(string): `Ethereum`

choices: No, this is not the way

raw.title: [BIP-644] Enable Gauge for amphrETH/rstETH/Re7LRT/steakLRT/wstETH (Ethereum)
raw.author: 0x7019Be4E4eB74cA5F61224FeAf687d2b43998516
raw.body:
PR with Payload
https://github.com/BalancerMaxis/multisig-ops/pull/1106

## Summary:

Mellow proposes to add a veBAL gauge for the amphrETH/rstETH/Re7LRT/steakLRT/wstETH 5pool on Balancer.

Root Gauge: https://etherscan.io/address/0x03ac2920378A51d6CA78813b1d7578Dab08d3760

## References/Useful links:

• Website: https://mellow.finance/

• Documentation: https://docs.mellow.finance/

• Github Public Repo: https://github.com/mellow-finance

• Twitter: https://twitter.com/mellowprotocol

## Protocol Description:

Mellow LRT is an innovative liquid restaking primitive allowing permissionless creation of modular LRTs. Mellow offers a series of vault smart contracts tailored to different risk profiles, managed by LRT curators. For more information, please see [here](https://docs.mellow.finance/mellow-lrt-primitive/overview).

Mellow has more than 41,000 stETH worth of assets restaked across 4 LRTs curated by P2P (rstETH), Steakhouse (steakLRT), re7 (Re7LRT), and MEV Capital (amphrETH). The protocol quickly reached its cap limits after it launched in mid June 2024. In addition, it recently opened two Ethena related vaults (sUSDe and ENA) and generated an additional 37.5M sUSDe and 23.3M ENA.

## Motivation:

Mellow is seeking to establish the amphrETH/rstETH/Re7LRT/steakLRT/wstETH on Balancer to develop liquidity for its stETH backed LRTs. This move aims to enhance the trading experience of users, making it more accessible for users while generating additional value for the Mellow community.

## Specifications:

1. Governance: Mellow currently operates with a multi-sig with [publicly](https://research.lido.fi/t/mellow-lido-alliance-proposal/7557/19) verified signers. The protocol is planning to transition to decentralized governance as soon as required research and preparations are made.

2. Oracles: Mellow is working with RedStone to create price feeds for its LRTs.

3. Audits: Mellow collaborates with renowned security experts and audit firms, including Chainsecurity, Statemind, and Spearbit, and we only release code to production after it has passed external audits.

  1. Statemind Report: https://github.com/mellow-finance/mellow-lrt/blob/dev-symbiotic-deploy/audits/202406_Statemind/Mellow%20LRT%20report%20with%20deployment.pdf
  2. Second audit to be announced
  3. Community audit https://audits.sherlock.xyz/contests/423

4. Centralization vectors: Centralization vectors currently are around upgradeability via 24h timelocked proxy multi-sig and front-end hosting.

5. Market History: Mellow has seen significant growth in TVL since launching in mid June with over 41k ETH across its 4 LRTs. Mellow

6. Value: The balancer pool is the first DEX liquidity pool for Mellow LRTs and is aimed at providing liquidity to its growing community. Mellow is committed to support LPs with a 2x points boost.

The balancer pools are already live and are available on Ethereum:

https://app.balancer.fi/#/ethereum/pool/0x4216d5900a6109bba48418b5e2ab6cc4e61cf4770000000000000000000006a1

Rate provider reviews: https://github.com/balancer/code-review/pull/93/files Will be updated after merged to repository.

### Technical Specifications:

Transaction: The Balancer Maxi LM Multisig eth:`0xc38c5f97B34E175FFd35407fc91a937300E33860` will interact with the GaugeAdderv4 at `0x5DbAd78818D4c8958EfF2d5b95b28385A22113Cd` and call the addGauge function with the following arguments:

gauge(address): `0x03ac2920378A51d6CA78813b1d7578Dab08d3760`

gaugeType(string): `Ethereum`

choices: No, this is not the way

decision.summary: The proposal to enable a veBAL gauge for rsETH/WETH on Ethereum is supported unanimously by early and stable voting trends, with positive precedents from similar past proposals. Despite slightly negative forum sentiment, the vote timeline and adjacent successes indicate this change will enrich liquidity and benefit the protocol.
key_arguments_for: Unanimous early vote support with stable and consistent lead ratios throughout the timeline.
Similar past proposals enabling new gauges passed with positive or stable market and TVL impacts.
The proposal enhances liquidity for rsETH, benefiting over 40,000 users and increasing trading accessibility.
Audits and reviewed oracles reduce risks related to security and centralization.
key_arguments_against: Forum discussion includes concerns about centralization vectors related to upgradeability and front-end hosting.
One negative sentiment comment suggests caution about the gauge implementation.

evidence.quote: Kelp proposes to add a veBAL gauge for rsETH/WETH on Balancer. Kelp has over 260,000 ETH restaked with 40,000 users. Audits from Sigma Prime and Code4rena completed.
Voting timeline shows 100% lead and stability for 'Yes, let's do it' option with early ratio 1.0.

available_choices: No, this is not the way
decision.ai_final_conclusion: Option 'Yes, let's do it' selected with stance to keep 'Change'.
decision.ai_final_reason:
• The voting timeline shows unanimous and stable early support for enabling the gauge, indicating strong voter conviction.
• Similar past proposals to enable new gauges also passed unanimously and resulted in positive or stable TVL and price impacts, supporting the decision to change.
• Although forum sentiment is slightly negative to neutral, it does not reflect the strong vote momentum and successful precedents; hence, the recommendation aligns with vote analytics rather than forum sentiment.
• The proposal offers enhanced liquidity to the growing rsETH community, backed by audits and reviewed oracles, supporting protocol health and user value.
